content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1.0 to x=5.5, y=1.0 to y=3.5)
Consists of:
- Three stone furnaces at positions (1.0, 1.0), (3.0, 1.0)
- Three burner inserters at positions (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)
- Three wooden chests at positions (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)
Current state: Furnaces idle with no ingredients, chests contain 30 and 95 iron plates respectively

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2.0 to x=4.5, y=7.0 to y=9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2.0, 7.0), (4.0, 7.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (2.5, 9.5), (4.5, 9.5)
Current state: Furnaces idle with no ingredients, chests contain 41 and 71 copper plates respectively

### Copper Cable Production Line (x=11.5 to x=14.5, y=11.5 to y=14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at position (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at position (11.5, 14.5) containing 93 copper cables
- Two burner inserters at positions (14.5, 12.5), (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production (x=21.5, y=12.5 to y=15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chest at position (21.5, 12.5)
- Burner inserter at position (21.5, 13.5)
Current state: Machine has 4 electronic circuits in output

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5 to x=13.5, y=26.5 to y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5, 35.5)
- Boiler at position (7.0, 35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5, 35.5)
- Two pipe groups connecting the components
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles
Current state: System is operational, generating power

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Always check fuel levels in boilers before attempting to insert more fuel
- Keep a reserve of coal in inventory for power generation needs

### Assembly Machine Resource Management
- Ensure proper supply chain of resources to assembly machines
- Current copper cable machine lacks copper plates
- Electronic circuit assembly machine lacks both iron plates and copper cables

### Inserter Placement and Configuration
- Multiple inserters are waiting for source items
- One inserter has blocked output due to missing destination entity
- Ensure complete input-output chains when setting up production lines

### Fluid System Connectivity
- One offshore pump is not connected to any fluid system
- Always ensure proper pipe connections when setting up fluid-based systems
